text: Budi Karya Sumadi (born 18 December 1956) is an Indonesian politician and architect. Since 2016, he has served as the Minister of Transportation in Joko Widodo's Working Cabinet. He was born in Palembang, South Sumatra. He studied architecture at Gadjah Mada University, Yogyakarta. On 14 March 2020, during the 2019â€“20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Sumadi had tested positive to COVID-19. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Architects Category:Indonesian politicians Category:South Sumatra
title: Budi Karya Sumadi
